Key Match Events: The New York Yankees won 2-0 against the Chicago Cubs, blanking them again
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone's team showed optimism and regrouped after the Soto departure
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees continue their push toward the playoffs, making roster moves to maintain flexibility and pitching depth
Others: Phil Bickford and Nick Burdi were designated for assignment ahead of the Cubs matchup
